channel.title: AP News - US News
channel.description: Top US News stories from AP News

item.title: Hurricane Erin stirs up strong winds and floods part of a NC highway as it slowly moves out to sea
item.description: Hurricane Erin has battered North Carolina’s Outer Banks with strong winds and waves that flooded part of the main highway and surged under beachfront homes.

item.title: The Texas House OK’d GOP-favored redistricting. California intends to counter with map of its own
Prosecutors say Sean ‘Diddy’ Combs’ request for acquittal or new trial should be swiftly rejected
